actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.
Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings without amendment. With written report No. 101-314.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 584.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

actions.committee: House Committee on Science, Space and Technology
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space and Technology.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: A bill to authorize the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to purchase approximately 8 acres of land at the Fort Sumner Municipal Airport, De Baca County, New Mexico.
short_title: Weather Balloon Launch Site Act of 1990

summary.text: Weather Balloon Launch Site Act of 1990 - Authorizes the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to purchase, with certain appropriated funds, approximately eight specified acres of land in New Mexico to use as a balloon launching facility.

titles.title: Weather Balloon Launch Site Act of 1990
A bill to authorize the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to purchase approximately 8 acres of land at the Fort Sumner Municipal Airport, De Baca County, New Mexico.
